TextBody:

Thank you for reaching out.

Could you please confirm if the test machine is running the same operating system as yours? Additionally, are the DPI settings configured the same way?

Best Regards,

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #441989 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000O2aWG:ref - Denylist is not applying right [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0O2aWG:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Ismail,

Please check to see if the Computer Settings are the same for both devices. It's possible that your device has Custom Settings, while the test device is on Global Settings, or vice versa.

You can verify this by navigating to Device Control -> Computers, and searching for the mentioned computers.

Thank you!
Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #441989 - - Denylist is not applying right [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0O2aWG:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Ismail,

Please ensure you are checking the Settings, not the Rights.

If you need to restore from Custom to Global Settings, right-click on the target computer, select Manage Settings, scroll to the bottom of the page, and click on Restore Global Settings.

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com
